title: Visma-Lease a Bike ‘Missing Sepp Kuss’ at Tour de France
content:
Vingegaard right-hand man Jorgenson rues his 'bad day’ as team plan to minimise Pogačar explosivity on Galibier falls flat.

Read the full article at Visma-Lease a Bike ‘Missing Sepp Kuss’ at Tour de France on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
